inclusion.criterion: Disease progression for the last 1-3 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Resistance of epilepsy to therapy with carbamazepine, valproic acid, topiramate, lamotrigine, and phenobarbital (anti-epileptic drugs/AEDs) as monotherapies or combination therapies
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: CNS inflammatory conditions, chronic psychoses, CNS tumors, relapses of chronic somatic or neurologic diseases, and blood positivity for hepatitis B or C or HIV
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy, and has been experiencing seizures. They have not responded well to previous treatments.
